name: Tsunami - Wilde Welle
description:
Ugh, earthquakes, am I right? First the ground goes brrrr and then there’s this huge wave that ruins whole cities. But thank god, there is a special someone. You. Yes you! Try to save as many people as you can by strategically placing barriers and/or upgrade buildings or even destroy them to block the water efficiently. All this is done in a turn-based gamestyle where you get enough time to plan your next move.

Save the people from that one city that is so famous, that we had to hide its name (totally not because we didn’t come up with one).

Keybindings

  • W, A, S, D - Camera movement
  • Left Mouse Click - Place barriers / Upgrade buildings
  • Right Click - Destroy buildings

The Team

  • Sven (Coding)
  • Chris (Coding) Steam
  • Sherry (Assets/Videos/very professional voiceovers) Insta
  • Mike (Voiceover/guy with beard) Insta
  • Caro (Coding/Assets)
  • Flo (Assets/Audio) Insta
